scripts.gen-protos: npx pbjs -t static-module -w es6 --no-verify --no-delimited --force-number -p protos -o src/generated/gtfsrt_nyct.js protos/com/google/transit/realtime/gtfs-realtime.proto protos/gtfs-realtime-NYCT.proto protos/mta-railroad.proto && npx pbjs -t static-module -w es6 --no-verify --no-delimited --force-number -p protos -o src/generated/gtfsrt_mercury.js protos/com/google/transit/realtime/gtfs-realtime.proto protos/gtfs-realtime-service-status.proto protos/mta-railroad.proto && npx pbts -o src/generated/gtfsrt_nyct.d.ts src/generated/gtfsrt_nyct.js && npx pbts -o src/generated/gtfsrt_mercury.d.ts src/generated/gtfsrt_mercury.js
scripts.build:proto: npm run fetch-protos && npm run gen-protos
scripts.dev: npm run build:proto && npx wrangler dev
scripts.deploy: npm run build:proto && npx wrangler deploy
